HOME_CONSTANTS.CAROUSEL_TEXT: Discover the secrets Cundinamarca has for you

TABS_CONSTANTS.SEARCH_BY_KEY_WORD: Search using key words or select a category. Example: Restaurants, music, museums
TABS_CONSTANTS.SELECT_TOWN: Choose a town for your search
TABS_CONSTANTS.ROUTE_STARTING_POINT_TIP: You can choose a starting point or allow the app to use your current location as your starting point
TABS_CONSTANTS.ROUTE_DESTINATION_POINT_TIP: Pick the town you are heading to
TABS_CONSTANTS.MAKE_ROUTE: Show me this route on the map

HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: It's so easy! This is how it works:
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION_1: Cundinamarca has for you a lot of experiences and wonderful destinations to explore
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION_2: De Tour por Cundinamarca helps you search places according to your interests so you get the opportunity to explore the region
HOW_IT_WORKS.DESCRIPTION_3: Enjoy all the adventures waiting for you!

HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.PAGE_TITLE: This is how De Tour por Cundinamarca works:
HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.DESCRIPTION_1: Create a profile for your business; it is completely free!
HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.DESCRIPTION_2: Show your products and services on the Internet
HOW_IT_WORKS_TRADER.DESCRIPTION_3: Make your business visible to 48% of the national tourism

REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.CREATE_ACCOUNT: Create an account for your town
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.NAME: Name of  your town
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_OPENINGHOURS_TEXT: Write your Citizen information point opening hours. For example:
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_GET_USER_LOCATION_TIP: Use your current location to indicate on the map where the Citizen information point is located
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_LOCATION_TIP: You can set a pin on the accurate location of  the Citizen information point
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.UPLOAD_SECONDARY_PHOTOS_TIP: Upload up to three photos of your town in each section to help tourists get to know it
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.COMPLETE_MUNICIPALITY_REGISTRATION_TEXT: Thanks for registering your town. Please, keep in mind the info you have registered will be visible only when the administrator has verified it. You will recieve an email when the process is complete.
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_CONSTANTS.COMPLETE_MUNICIPALITY_UPLOAD_TEXT: Your town information has been updated

REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.UPLOAD_MAIN_PHOTO_TIP: Upload a Profile picture of your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_UPLOAD_MAIN_PHOTO_TIP: Upload a Profile picture of your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.UPLOAD_SECONDARY_PHOTOS_TIP: Upload up to three photos of your business in each section to help your clients get to know your business and your products
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_UPLOAD_SECONDARY_PHOTOS_TIP: Upload up to three photos of the site in each section to help tourists get to know it
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_FACADE_PHOTOS: Pictures of the facade of your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_BUSINESS_FACADE_PHOTOS: Pictures of the main entrace of the place
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_PRODUCTS_PHOTOS: Pictures of your Products or Services

REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_GET_USER_LOCATION_TIP: Use your current location to indicate on the map where your business is located
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_BUSINESS_GET_USER_LOCATION_: Use your current location to indicate on the map where the place is located
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.BUSINESS_LOCATION_TIP: You can set a pin on the map on the accurate location of your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_BUSINESS_LOCATION_TIP: You can set a pin on the map on the accurate location of the place
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_CHOOSE_CATEGORY_TEXT: Select the category that corresponds to the activity that tourists can find on the place
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.CHOOSE_AUXILIAR_CATEGORY_TEXT: Select an additional category for your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_CHOOSE_AUXILIAR_CATEGORY_TE: Select an additional category for your business
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.CHOOSE_OTHER_CATEGORY_TEXT: If your business has other economic activities you can add two additional categories
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_CHOOSE_OTHER_CATEGORY_TEXT: If the place has other activities,  you can add two additional categories

REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_CHOOSE_OTHER_CATEGORY_TEXT_: If the place has other activities, you can add an additional category
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.CHOOSE_SUBCATEGORY_TEXT: Select one or more subcategories to specify your business activities
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_CHOOSE_SUBCATEGORY_TEXT: Select one or more subcategories to specify places's activities
REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.PHONE_VALIDATION: Required field, must be a minimum 7 and maximum 10 digits number

REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_TAGS_TEXT: Enter a comma separated list of tags to help your visitors find yor place easily. Example:

REGISTER_SITE_CONSTANTS.MUNICIPALITY_COMPLETE_UPDATE_TEXT: Your bussines information has been updated successfully

LOGIN.PASSWORD_LENGTH: The password must be at least 6 characters long*

ACCOUNT_INFO.PASSWORDS_MUST_BE_EQUAL: The confirmation password must be the same as the entered password.*
ACCOUNT_INFO.OLD_AND_NEW_PASSWORDS_MUST_BE_DIFFERENT: New and confirm password must be the same*

ROUTE_CREATION.MAKE_ROUTE_TIP: You can register a route with the places that have been registered inside the town
ROUTE_CREATION.INCORRECT_NUMBER_OF_POINTS_ERROR: The Route must have at least two places*

ERROR_PLACE_OUTSIDE_CUNDINAMARCA: Cundinamarca locations outside are not allowed
ERROR_UNAVAILABLE_LOCATION: Sorry, your location is currently unavailable
ERROR_INITIAL_AND_DESTINY_POINTS: Set an initial and destiny points
ERROR_YOU_SHOULD_FILL_YOUR_ROUTE_ORIGIN: You must choose your starting point
ERROR_SERVER_COMMUNICATION: Has occurred an server error, please try again later
ERROR_POINT_OUTSIDE_MUNICIPALITY_BOUNDAR: Verify that selected location is inside choosed town
CONFIRM_DELETE_SITE: Are you sure to delete this place?
CONFIRM_DELETE_ROUTE: Are you sure to delete this route?
ERROR_ROUTE_NOT_VALID: Route with just 2 places, initial place can not be the same that destiny place
GET_SITES_ERROR: The search option is unavailable in this moment. Please reload the page
GET_TOWNS_ERROR: The towns list is unavailable in this moment. Please reload the page
NO_RESULTS: Sorry, there are no results for this search. Please try with different words.
REGISTER_SUCCESS: You are the newest member of De Tour por Cundinamarca. Please login to edit the profile settings in your account, update your info or register other business or branch offices, please log in
REGISTER_MUNICIPALITY_SUCCESS: You are the newest member of De Tour por Cundinamarca. Now you can register your town
CONTACT_INFO: If you have a problem, question or a suggestion, you can write to
E102: password must be at least 6 characters
INCORRECT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_MUNICIPALITY: It looks like you have a town account, please log in as a town
INCORRECT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_TRADER: It looks like you have a trader account, please log in as a trader
TIMEOUT_CONNECTION_ERROR: This operation is taking too long. Please check your internet connection or try again later
DOUBLE_REGISTER_ERROR: Please log out before register other account
DOUBLE_LOGIN_ERROR: Please log out before login with another account
EMAIL_SENT_TEXT: We have sent you an email with your new password. Please, remember to change it for a password you will remember, so you can login more easily

DELETE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Disable my account
DELETE_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: Your account will be disabled. Your places and all the information you have posted will no longer be visible on the platform

DISABLED_MUNICIPALITY_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Blocked account
DISABLED_MUNICIPALITY_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: Your account has been blocked by the platform administrator. Request more information by sending an email to innovatic_fibog@unal.edu.co

DISABLED_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Blocked account
DISABLED_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: Your account has been blocked by the platform administrator. Find more information in the citizen information point of your town

REACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account deactivated
REACTIVATE_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: This account is currently deactivated.  To reactivate it, click 'Continue'

REACTIVATE_MUNICIPALITY_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account deactivated
REACTIVATE_MUNICIPALITY_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: Your account is deactivated. The information you post will not be visible on the platform while the account is not active. Request activation of the account to the administrator by sending an email to innovatic_fibog@unal.edu.co

E105: Your account has been blocked by the platform administrator. Unable to retrieve password

HOW_IT_WORKS_MUNICIPALITY.TITLE: This is how De Tour por Cundinamarca works:
HOW_IT_WORKS_MUNICIPALITY.DESCRIPTION_1: Create a profile for your town with information, text and images
HOW_IT_WORKS_MUNICIPALITY.DESCRIPTION_2: Register sites of interest in your town that will help promoting the town
HOW_IT_WORKS_MUNICIPALITY.DESCRIPTION_3: Make routes between your town's places for tourist follows it

MORE_RESULTS: Scroll down to find more places
MORE_RESULTS_MOBILE: Swipe right to find more places
